Reign: Joint reign of Hatshepsut and Thutmose III
Geography: Country of Origin Egypt, Upper Egypt; Thebes, Sheikh Abd el-Qurna, Tomb of Senenmut (TT 71), below, deposit of hunting weapons, MMA 1935–1936
Dimensions: Hilt and Shaft l. 124 cm (48 13/16 in); diam. of shaft 3/8 in)
Hilt l. 50.2 cm (19 3/4 in); diam. of knob 2.5 cm (1 in)
Provenance: Excavated by the Egyptian Expedition of the Metropolitan Museum of Art, 1935–1936. Acquired by the Museum in the division of finds, 1936.
